entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 06:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNE 50 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Cape Race. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 near Cape Race overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 near Cape Race in the morning.
